'''Aradashan''' is an [[NPC]] from [[Sumeru]]. It is a part of the [[Aranara]] and is responsible for sealing [[Ruin Machines]] throughout Sumeru using [[Stone Pillar Seal]]s. They remain underground of [[Ashavan Realm]] after completing the ''[[Legends of the Stone Lock]]'' World Quest.
